title: EPSS vs. CVSS: What’s the Best Approach to Vulnerability Prioritization?
description: Many businesses rely on the Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) to assess the severity of vulnerabilities for prioritization. While these scores provide some insight into the potential impact of a vulnerability, they don’t factor in real-world threat data, such as the likelihood of exploitation.
